text: Saint-Vigor-des-Mézerets is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the new commune of Terres de Druance.Arrêté préfectoral 2 December 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Saint-Vigor-des-Mézerets
